title: SET_ENTITY_DISTANCE_CULLING_RADIUS
content:
0xD3A183A3// SetEntityDistanceCullingRadius
void SET_ENTITY_DISTANCE_CULLING_RADIUS(Entity entity, float radius);Parameters:entity: The entity handle to override the distance culling radius.radius: The new distance culling radius.It overrides the default distance culling radius of an entity. Set to 0.0 to reset.
If you want to interact with an entity outside of your players' scopes set the radius to a huge number.WARNING: Culling natives are deprecated and have known, unfixable issues
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityDistanceCullingRadius
